mapper.sql: MHID, NAME, TYPE, MODEL, POWER, CHARGE, DAY_REPAIRMAN, NIGHT_REPAIRMAN, BARCODE, BARCODEURL, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, BZ, CHANGE_RULE
mapper.insert:
insert into
( MHID, NAME, TYPE, MODEL, POWER, CHARGE, DAY_REPAIRMAN, NIGHT_REPAIRMAN, BARCODE, BARCODEURL, COMPANY_ID, BZ, CHANGE_RULE ) values ( #{MHID}, #{NAME}, #{TYPE}, #{MODEL}, #{POWER}, #{CHARGE}, #{DAY_REPAIRMAN}, #{NIGHT_REPAIRMAN}, #{BARCODE}, #{BARCODEURL}, #{COMPANY_ID}, #{BZ}, #{CHANGE_RULE} )
mapper.update:
update
set NAME = #{NAME}, TYPE = #{TYPE}, MODEL = #{MODEL}, POWER = #{POWER}, CHARGE = #{CHARGE}, DAY_REPAIRMAN = #{DAY_REPAIRMAN}, NIGHT_REPAIRMAN = #{NIGHT_REPAIRMAN}, BARCODE = #{BARCODE}, BARCODEURL = #{BARCODEURL}, BZ = #{BZ}, CHANGE_RULE = #{CHANGE_RULE} where MHID = #{MHID}
mapper.select: select a.MHID, a.NAME, a.TYPE, a.MODEL, a.POWER, a.CHARGE, a.DAY_REPAIRMAN, a.NIGHT_REPAIRMAN, a.BARCODE, a.BARCODEURL, a.COMPANY_ID, a.DELETED, a.BZ, a.CHANGE_RULE ,(SELECT d.`name` from oa_company_basic d WHERE a.type= d.ocbid) as typeName from a where a.MHID = #{MHID}
select a.MCID,a.MHID,a.CYCLEID,a.BZ,b.NAME from oa_machine_cycle a LEFT JOIN oa_company_basic b ON b.ocbid = a.CYCLEID WHERE a.mhid=#{mhid} AND a.deleted=0
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_machine_cycle SET deleted=1 where mhid=#{MHID}
mapper.select: select a.MPID,a.MHID,a.PROJECTID,b.`name` as repairName from oa_machine_projec a LEFT JOIN oa_company_basic b ON a.projectid = b.ocbid WHERE a.mhid=#{mhid} and a.deleted=0
